pokemons.name: Charmander
pokemons.description: The flame on its tail indicates Charmander's life force. If it is healthy, the flame burns brightly.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

abilities.name: Solar Power
abilities.description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in sunny weather, but HP decreases every turn.

pokemons.name: Squirtle
pokemons.description: Squirtle's shell is not just used for protection. The shell's rounded shape and the grooves on its surface help minimize resistance in water, enabling this Pokémon to swim at high speeds.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.description: The Pokémon gradually recovers HP in rain.

pokemons.name: Bulbasaur
pokemons.description: Bulbasaur can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun's rays, the seed grows progressively larger.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.description: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.
